document.title: Interviewproject Nederlandse Veteranen
document.intro: The IPNV Corpus is a corpus originally compiled by the Veteraneninstituut (VI). It comprises a collection of more than 1,100 (recorded) interviews with veterans who were involved in wars and other military actions that the Dutch military forces took part in. The average duration of an i... more than 1,100 (recorded) interviews with veterans who were involved in wars and other military actions that the Dutch military forces took part in.
